qrList.label: 杀手z
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["以下都可输入剧情后点击","发消息(输入消息后再点)","发消息在Message内","隐藏Message","开启Message"] Zephyr功能|
/setvar key=option ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="" {: /flushvar option | /abort :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="以下都可输入剧情后点击" {: /send "" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="发消息(输入消息后再点)" {: /send "<Request:$发消息><um1>{{input}}</um1><um2></um2>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="隐藏Message" {: /send "<Request:去除正文中的底部状态栏Message部分><um1>{{input}}</um1><um2></um2>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="开启Message" {: /send "<Request:加入底部状态栏Message部分><um1>{{input}}</um1><um2></um2>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="发消息在Message内" {: /send "<Request:将{{user}}发送的消息内容显示在Message内><um1>{{input}}</um1><um2></um2>" :} ||
/flushvar option ||
/trigger||
